# TmCreateNoteRequest

**Properties**

| Name  | Type | Required | Description                                                                            |
| :---- | :--- | :------- | :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| title | str  | ✅       | Title of a note. Max allowed length is 250 characters                                  |
| body  | str  | ❌       | Contents of a note; HTML markup text. Max allowed length is 1048576 characters (1 Mb). |
